kv8.7:5.1: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.3: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:5.5: atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.7: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṁ atthi rasāyatanaṁ, tāya jivhāya taṁ rasaṁ sāyati …pe…
kv8.7:5.8: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:6.2: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.4: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:6.6: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.9: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:7.1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, na ca tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.3: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ atthi rūpāyatanaṁ, na ca tena cakkhunā taṁ rūpaṁ passatīti?
kv8.7:7.5: atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, na ca tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.8: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, na ca tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:8.2: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, na ca tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:8.5: atthi tattha manāyatanaṁ atthi dhammāyatanaṁ, na ca tena manena taṁ dhammaṁ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:9.1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṁ atthi gandhāyatanaṁ, tena ghānena taṁ gandhaṁ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:9.3: Atthi tattha mūlagandho sāragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho āmagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandhoti?
kv8.7:10.1: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṁ atthi rasāyatanaṁ, tāya jivhāya taṁ rasaṁ sāyatīti?
kv8.7:10.3: Atthi tattha mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambilaṁ madhuraṁ tittakaṁ kaṭukaṁ loṇiyaṁ khāriyaṁ lambilaṁ kasāvo sādu asādūti?
kv8.7:11.1: Atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṁ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, tena kāyena taṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv8.7:11.3: Atthi tattha kakkhaḷaṁ mudukaṁ saṇhaṁ pharusaṁ sukhasamphassaṁ dukkhasamphassaṁ garukaṁ lahukanti?
kv8.7:12.4: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittaṁ jivhānimittaṁ kāyanimittanti?
kv8.7:12.6: Hañci atthi tattha ghānanimittaṁ jivhānimittaṁ kāyanimittaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
